Articles.Content:
Have a ship, that was orbiting Mun before the 1.4 release. After 1.4 SAS will not work on it. Ship has a pilot (jeb). I hit the button for SAS, it toggles for a split second on and off. Manual flight controls dont respond (that would normally use sas.

Ive messed with "control from here", de coupled a stage, eva and back,and a few other things, nothing makes it change. 

 

Reaction wheels according to the pod (mk1) keep flicking between working and idle. 

Edited March 18, 2018 by zapman987
NM figured it out. Had "kill rotation" set on the flight computer. Removed it, started working.
yeah, mechjeb automatically disables the Stock SAS when in use
